snippet.title: And the Hero Was Never Seen Again - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After defeating the Demon King, the Hero Astel is affected by a magic that turns him into a woman, and resets her powers. Now she must retrain her powers when the "true demons" begin to appear once more.

And the Hero Was Never Seen Again on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/and-the-hero-was-never-seen-again/

And the Hero Was Never Seen Again on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2582660/And_the_Hero_Was_Never_Seen_Again/
